text_media: Simplify your hiring process with DigitalHire.
onboarding_information: By tapping “Create account”  or “Sign In” , I agree to the Terms of Service, General Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
titl_job_titl: What job are you looking for?
titl_co_route: What would you like to use?
set_job_title_job_post: What job title are you looking for?
bdy_sel_emp_role: Post video job ads and watch VideoResumes of AI-matched top talent.
bdy_sel_role: Welcome to our platform! Please select your role to continue.
bdy_sel_cand_role: Find the perfect role for your skills and career goals by searching through job openings.
bdy_man_stp: Confirm this information to create your company profile. It can also be changed later.
bdy_pst_job: Connect with top talent and grow your business by posting job openings, reviewing VedioResumes.
bdy_expl_job: Find the perfect role for your skills and career goals by searching through job openings.
bdy_cand_qk_stp: Instantly set up your profile with your LinkedIn profile URL. If you don't have a website, you can continue setting up manually.
bdy_emp_qk_stp: Instantly set up your company profile with your website URL. If you don't have a website, you can continue setting up manually.
bdy_vrfy_email_2: . Confirm it belongs to you to keep your account secure.
bdy_vid_res: You will get 30 seconds to answer each of the following questions:
bdy_onbd_vid: Find the best job for you with DigitalHire.
bdy_vrfy_email1: Enter the email address you use to sign in to DigitalHire, you will receive a password reset email.
bdy_vrfy_email2: Reset password email has been sent to
body_select_job_post: Which process do you want to choose?
body_set_job_title_job_post: This information will help us match your job post with relevant candidates who have the right skills and qualifications for the position.
cp_vrfy_email3: in the email we sent you.
invalid_boolean_expression: Invalid value for a true/false option.
candidate_database_failed: Failed to access the candidate database.
invalid_ai_client_response: Invalid response from the AI client.
applicant_db_filter_not_found: Filter not found in applicant database.
applicant_db_filter_update_failed: Failed to update applicant database filter.
employer_applicant_view_restriction: You do not have permission to view this applicant.
reset_password_link_failed: Failed to send reset password link.
applicant_signup_event_failed: Failed to record applicant signup event.
get_screening_answer_media_failed: Failed to retrieve screening answer media.
get_screening_question_id_failed: Failed to retrieve screening question ID.
illegal_job_application_state_update_req: Illegal job application state update request.
job_application_state_update_failed: Failed to update job application state.
get_job_openings_by_company_failed: Failed to retrieve job openings by company.
failed_to_get_job_openings_list: Failed to retrieve job openings list.
already_applied_to_job_ad: Already applied to this job ad.
media_get_presigned_url_failed: Failed to retrieve presigned URL for media.
company_update_failed: We couldn't update your company details. Please try again.
company_fetch_failed: We couldn't retrieve your company information. Please refresh and try again.
company_creation_failed: We couldn't create your company. Please check your details and try again.
bucket_applicant_failed: We had trouble accessing your applicant data. Please try again later.
company_apllicant_bucket_creation_failed: We couldn't create a space for your applicants. Please try again.
save_failed_in_bucket: We couldn't save your data. Please try again.
company_not_found: We couldn't find your company. Please check the details and try again.
user_company_fetch_failed: We couldn't load your company details. Please try again later.
company_apllicant_bucket_fetch_failed: We had trouble accessing your applicants. Please try again later.
company_email_not_correct: The company email you entered doesn't seem correct. Please check and try again.
NO_PAYMENT_PLAN_FOUND: We couldn't find a payment plan for your account. Please select a plan to continue.
NO_SUBSCRIPTION_FOUND: It looks like you don't have an active subscription. Please check your account or subscribe to a plan.
NO_BILLING_USER_FOUND: We couldn't find any billing information for your account. Please update your billing details.
MULTIPLE_BILLING_USER: It seems there are multiple billing profiles linked to your account. Please contact support to resolve this.
something_went_wrong: Oops! Something went wrong. Please check your internet connection or try again in a few moments.
